greeting: Hello! I'm here to help you with mortgage questions - whether you're buying, refinancing, or exploring your options.
fallback_response: That's an excellent question that I'd love to have our mortgage specialist answer for you personally. What's the best number to reach you at?

What mortgage rate can I get.answer: Current rates vary based on your credit score, down payment, and loan type. With excellent credit (740+), rates are typically 0.25-0.5% lower. We work with 50+ lenders to find you the best rate. Rates change daily, so let me get you a personalized quote.
What mortgage rate can I get.follow_up: I can get you rate quotes from multiple lenders in minutes. What's your estimated credit score?

How much house can I afford.answer: Generally, you can afford a home that's 3-4 times your annual income, but it depends on your debts, down payment, and other factors. Most lenders prefer your total monthly debts (including the new mortgage) to be under 43% of your gross income. Let me run some numbers for you.
How much house can I afford.follow_up: I can calculate your exact buying power in just a few minutes. What's your approximate annual household income?

What documents do I need.answer: You'll need: 2 years tax returns, 2 months pay stubs, 2 months bank statements, W-2s, credit report authorization, and property information. For self-employed borrowers, we may need additional business documents. I can provide a complete checklist.
What documents do I need.follow_up: Getting organized upfront speeds up the process significantly. Would you like me to email you our complete document checklist?

great_rate.title: Saved $300/Month with Better Rate
great_rate.description: See how we found Jennifer a rate 0.75% lower than her bank offered

closing_questions: Do you have any other mortgage questions I can help with?
Would you like me to get you pre-qualified today?
Are you looking to buy or refinance?
